Name: Boom Boomerang
About the game: Boom Boomerang is a VR arcade-style boomerang game. Master the skill of throwing and catching virtual boomerangs to destroy bombs before they explode. Unlock new boomerangs by collecting awards in Arcade Mode, compete on the global leaderboard in Survival Mode, and fight off the chaos in Onslaught Mode. Features: - Unique gameplay built for VR. - Three game modes: Arcade, Survival and Onslaught. - Global and local leaderboards for each mode and arcade level. - Two difficulty settings with aim-assist available. - Unlockable Boomerangs and Boomerang Trails. - Dynamic environment and music.
